projects.title: IoT Data Processing Pipeline
projects.description: Built a high-throughput IoT solution on AWS IoT Core, Kinesis, and DynamoDB. Enabled real-time analytics for millions of sensor readings.

projects.title: Helm Chart Deployment
projects.description: Created a Helm chart for multi-container microservices on Kubernetes. Streamlined CI/CD with versioned Helm releases for alpha, beta, and gamma environments.

projects.title: AWS RDS Migration & Optimization
projects.description: Migrated MS SQL databases to Amazon RDS with minimal downtime. Analyzed 1-year usage data to optimize costs using Reserved Instances.

projects.title: Elastic Beanstalk Customization
projects.description:
Customized EB environments for security and monitoring.
Implemented strict egress rules, advanced logging, and CloudWatch metrics for multi-tier apps.
